in.fissionlabs.kpinsights.service

Interface RoleService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RoleServiceImpl

    public interface RoleService

    Service class to perform below user services :

    • Create Role
    • Update Role
    • Delete Role
    • Display Role
    • Display all Roles
    Author:
    bismoy

        Parameters:

        roleName - name of role assigned to a user
